oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
|a!kunta (Stoffel) (I)
=kasin (Klaas Katkop) (IV)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The names of a number of Stars have been ascertained with the kind help of Mr. Maclear. Besides a separate alphabetical index to the Stars, the names of some are given in a supplementary list (B XXV. 2345-2347 and 2354). |xam names of stars and constellations. 1) p.2345: the names of various white men, 2) p.2355: (17 March 1874) this page features information on Katkop, including its |xam name and where it is situated (given by =kasin), 3) (11 October '73) Proper and |xam names of stars and constellations, 4) This story is found in Book XXV.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wilhelm Bleek notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Names of stars
